entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
